author: dlr
msg: Name local error variables per the usual idiom.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/locks.c
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/util.c
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/log.c
Replace local variable "error" with "err".  In log.c, remove an
extra SVN_ERR() statement as well.

author: dlr
msg: * COMMITTERS: Update Madan's email address.

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: fix authz_tests 10. When creating an activity is forbidden, raise
the correct error instead of aborting.
Note: ra_serf will try to delete the activity when creation failed. The delete
isn't strictly necessary, and will also be forbidden by the server.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/commit.c
(open_root): replace abort() with error.
(abort_edit): add 403 forbidden as acceptable status.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix copy test #49 (copy added path to URL).
(The root cause was the protocol error in mod_dav_svn; the changes to ra_serf
add a touch of robustness for this particular error case.)
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/reports/log.c
(dav_svn__log_report): Do not write an empty response if we have an error;
this fixes protocol breakage which causes the client never to see the error!
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/log.c
(log_context_t): Track the status code to avoid aborting when we see an
error.
(svn_ra_serf__get_log): Check for errors in parsing and return them.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/util.c
(svn_ra_serf__handle_xml_parser): Try to handle server errors gracefully.
(svn_ra_serf__handle_server_error): Do not create a fallback error.
(handle_response): If we have a 4xx or 5xx and the server didn't give us
a parseable error, create a fallback one ourselves.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix/optimize our peg-rev log lookup strategy.
Fixes log test #4 ('svn log -rN some_dir_unchanged_in_N'), copy tests #56 (move
multiple files within a repo), #57 (copy multiple files within a repo), #58
(copy multiple files from a repo to a wc), #59 (copy multiple files from a wc
to a repo).
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/log.c
(svn_ra_serf__get_log): When fed a peg-rev, skip asking for the baseline
collection explicitly and just ask the proper vcc-url ourselves; when not
fed a peg-rev, do the vcc->baseline->baseline-collection dance.
